Name: Shiny Summer
About the game: General Shiny Summer is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls Incredible Atmosphere , Great Music , lots of levels with girls art in HD quality. The game is great for relaxing after a hard day. Features Several difficulty levels. Relaxing gameplay 9 HD quality art with beautiful girls Pleasant atmosphere. Game Modes: EASY - 4x4 MEDIUM - 4x6 ADVANCED - 6x10 HARD - 8x14 EPIC - 10x16 Thanks to artists - Andrey Apoev, hadaka zaru and apricot!
